faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Discover answers to your queries about AI Video Face Swap

items.title: What types of videos can I use this feature on?
items.description: You can use this feature on a variety of videos, including personal recordings, film clips, or social media content. The AI adapts to different scenarios and video qualities.

items.title: Is the service free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user gets 20 free credits daily to swap faces in videos. You can earn more credits through engagement in our community activities.

items.title: Can I use the swapped content commercially?
items.description: All users on paid plans can utilize swapped content for commercial projects. Free-tier users can use it for personal enjoyment only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All processing occurs directly within your browser, using advanced encryption to ensure your data stays private. Once you close the tab, all processing data is cleared.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the magic of face swapping. No sign-up necessary.
